const db = getFirestore(); const courseId = 'course_bsit'; const subjectId = 'DYBITDms113'; // Change this to any subject ID you want to test const subjectRef = doc(db, `courses/${courseId}/subjects/${subjectId}`); getDoc(subjectRef).then((docSnap) => { if (docSnap.exists()) { console.log("Subject data:", docSnap.data()); } else { console.log(`No details found for subject ID: ${subjectId}`); } }).catch((error) => { console.error('Error fetching subject:', error); });
